messages.subject: Disrespect to Sandra
messages.msgSnippet: Jeva, how dare you come on this list and then go to RUL and attack Sandra like that. You come on here talking about peaceful parenting or whatever it was you
messages.messageBody:
Jeva, how dare you come on this list and then go to RUL and attack
Sandra like that. You come on here talking about peaceful parenting
or
whatever it was you were going on and on about and then go and do
that? From what I saw, Sandra was not even on list for a while, why
attack her personally? Why single her out? Are you jealous?

People have been short and flippy with me but to go on a public
unschooling list and talk about someone like that is just so immature.
Sandra may be short when she is tired of hearing something over and
over, sometimes I agree, sometimes I don't BUT I have a lot of
respect for her and all that she does to help parents and children.
She isone person on this list that you can count on to help if you
are
having a problem unschooling or even life in general.

And just for the record, you made a complete ass out of yourself on
RUL. Someone posted there last week about not liking Sandra and some
guy on the list stuck up for Sandra and the conversation dropped. So
there seems to be more on that list that care for Sandra than dislike
or maybe they weren't up to playing gossip games, I don't know. Seems
to me that you have a problem and maybe you should keep it to
yourself.

Kim
